column5: Figured I would take the cooking stuff with me this morning and have a snack on the ice. Fishing was very slow,but atleast I got breaky.LOL  Those scuds are awesome.             Now that dosent get any fresher.  YUMMY
Mint !!  That's awesome Brian.  I can't wait to do things like that with Alex
I think you should mention these pics are unrelated!
At least I hope they are
LOL SMELT KID SMELT.
Shows how many smelt I've caught!
Ya,somedays are better then others.  Yesterday catch.
Very nice Brian,I guess scuds are now on my "to get"list .lol.
no 'taters ?
That is fresh

Nice feed , I may have to start targeting them. Seems every hole we drilled,  the graphs were black with school after school of them . I'd take those over a big greaser in the freezer any day ! Nice work Brian .
Hey buuuudday!  Whacha up to this weekend?!  I got some light blue skuds that I wanna try...

Nice feed , I may have to start targeting them. Seems every hole we drilled, the graphs were black with school after school of them . I'd take those over a big greaser in the freezer any day ! Nice work Brian .   Ryan,when the blue cloud rolls in,it,s smelts. When the red yellow shows,it those pesky herring.  Drifter,Saturday is booked for the Tyler event,,but sunday I can fish from 6am til noon. Nascar sundays rule once again. I dont PVR.LOL

Ryan,when the blue cloud rolls in,it,s smelts. When the red yellow shows,it those pesky herring.  Drifter,Saturday is booked for the Tyler event,,but sunday I can fish from 6am til noon. Nascar sundays rule once again. I dont PVR.LOL  Right on mane.  Good luck at the event.
Nice haul man!  I've got some roe to barter for some whole ones
Nice catch! Up on Lady Simcoe I take it? Any tips for one who's never caught Smelt?
Wow, good stuff B.  Can't wait for our invite to dinner one of these days
That's what it's all about right there!!! Good going B

I remember my father and uncles bringing home bushel baskets of them home from below the James Allen Skyway Bridge in Hamilton.  Just like I predicted Misfish, no event for me this weekend, am walking with a cane this week. Again sorry I'm miss it.
Nice catch! Up on Lady Simcoe I take it? Any tips for one who's never caught Smelt? Scuds
